law.catch_line: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall:...

text.section:
To qualify for a license, an applicant shall:
Comply with the requirements of this subtitle and the rules and regulations adopted under this subtitle;
Agree to permit access to the food establishment for the purpose of any inspection permitted or required under this subtitle; and
Pay the license fee assessed under § 21-308 of this subtitle, unless exempted from the fee under this subtitle or any rule or regulation adopted under this subtitle.
Before issuing a license, the Department may inspect the food establishment identified in the application to determine if the food establishment meets the requirements for a license.
